short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coinbase Wallet extension is the safest and easiest way to use crypto apps in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto is just getting started, and Coinbase Wallet is your key to what’s next. Coinbase Wallet is a self-custody crypto wallet that puts you in control and unlocks the entire world of crypto. Our browser extension gives you access to the exciting world of decentralized finance, NFTs and dapps – all at your fingertips.

With the Coinbase Wallet extension you can:
- Explore the decentralized web with confidence. 
- Kickstart your NFT collection
- Harness the power of DeFi to earn yield
- Trade thousands of tokens on DEXes
- Do more with your crypto 

The Coinbase Wallet extension lets you access web3 and connect to thousands of dapps across Ethereum and all EVM-compatible networks, including Avalanche, Polygon, BNB Chain, and more. Coinbase Wallet extension also supports sending and receiving Solana and SPL tokens.

Learn more at coinbase.com/wallet
